mapper.insert: insert into caedictionaryministries (ministriesId, ministriesnumber, `name`, isEffective, startTime, endTime, unitDepartmentId, nominationId) values (#{ministriesid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ministriesnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iseffective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitdepartmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nominationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update caedictionaryministries set ministriesnumber = #{ministriesnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isEffective = #{iseffective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitDepartmentId = #{unitdepartmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nominationId = #{nominationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ministriesId = #{ministriesid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ministriesId, ministriesnumber, `name`, isEffective, startTime, endTime, unitDepartmentId, nominationId from caedictionaryministries where ministriesId = #{ministriesid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ministriesId, ministriesnumber, `name`, isEffective, startTime, endTime, unitDepartmentId, nominationId from caedictionaryministries
